t: For the director of music. According to mahalath. A maskil of David.
The*pn fool says in his heart, “There*ld is no God.” They*ln are corrupt, and their ways are vile; there*ld is no one who does good.
God*pn looks down from heaven on*ld all mankind to*ln see if there are any who understand, any*ld who seek God.
Everyone*ln has turned away, all have become corrupt; there*ld is no one who does good, not*ld even one.
Do*pn all these evildoers know nothing? They*pn devour my people as though eating bread; they*ld never call on God.
But*ln there they are, overwhelmed with dread, where*ld there was nothing to dread. God*ln scattered the bones of those who attacked you; you*ld put them to shame, for God despised them.
Oh,*pn that salvation for Israel would come out of Zion! When*ld God restores his people, let*ld Jacob rejoice and Israel be glad!
